name: fargate-service-with-auto-scaling
description: ECS Service of launch type FARGATE with Application Auto Scaling

scripts.deploy: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run build && npm run bootstrap && cdk deploy --require-approval=never *-stack
scripts.synth: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run build && cdk synthesize *-stack
scripts.diff: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run build && cdk diff
